record.title: RECESS

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is no further business to come before the Senate, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand in recess under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 5:33 p.m., recessed until 8:21 p.m. and reassembled when called to order by the Presiding Officer (Ms. KLOBUCHAR).

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I move to reconsider the vote on which cloture was not invoked on the Rockefeller-Bond substitute amendment and move to lay that motion on the table.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: I suggest the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.
The assistant legislative clerk proceeded to call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
